Aliaune Damala Badara Akon Thiam (/ ˈeɪkɒn/; amuru Eprel 16, 1973), onye amara aha ya dika Akon, bu onye egwu America-Snegal, onye na-edekọ ihe, na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama na 2004 na-esote ntọhapụ nke "Locked Up" (na-egosipụta Styles P), nke mbụ sitere na album mbụ ya bụ nsogbu (2004), sochiri nke abụọ "Lonely".
